Given that a lot of places I wanted to try in Barcelona were closed for vacations, this one was one of the few still open and boy, was I lucky! The meal was a great value, good portion (yes, I am from the US and like to eat...) and the taste was unbelievable.  We had "mother in law" style snails, which were a bit salty, but the red sauce was to die for.   We also had a cod dish, but I forgot the name of it. It was something in mayo coating, and definitely NOT the ratatouille one. Just amazing!  Also had a skewer of sausages, which was amazing, including my beloved blood sausage.  Basically, if you're looking for a great meal, for good price - this is a MUST. It is probably better to cab there if you don't know the neighborhood, because the major metro stations are kind of far, and I have no clue if you can bus it there. Very very worth going!
